scripts.build: rm -rf server/dist && npm -w client run build -- --emptyOutDir --outDir ../server/dist
scripts.build:staging: rm -rf server/dist && npm -w client run build:staging -- --emptyOutDir --outDir ../server/dist
scripts.build:production: rm -rf server/dist && npm -w client run build:production -- --emptyOutDir --outDir ../server/dist
scripts.preview: npm run build --mode=${npm_config_mode} && npm -w server start
